sentences.sContent: It was winter, and I was in Harlem.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was winter, and I was in Harlem.
sentences.sCn: 这是一个冬天，我是在黑人住宅区。

sentences.sContent: So was Harlem: Tear gas hung in the air as I came out of the subway on West 96th Street.
sentences.sContent_eng: So was Harlem: Tear gas hung in the air as I came out of the subway on West 96th Street.
sentences.sCn: 黑人住宅区也是如此：我走出西区第96街的地铁站，空气中弥漫着催泪瓦斯。

sentences.sContent: The study included children who were born to non-smoking Black and Dominican American women age 18 to 35 who resided in Washington Heights, Harlem or the South Bronx in New York.
sentences.sContent_eng: The study included children who were born to non-smoking Black and Dominican American women age 18 to 35 who resided in Washington Heights, Harlem or the South Bronx in New York.
sentences.sCn: 研究中包括住在纽约华盛顿高地、黑人住宅区和南布朗克斯，年龄从18岁到35岁的妇女的孩子，他们的母亲是不吸烟的多米尼加人。
